Pictured above: Puttu Fry with sambol ... more Image 109 of 109 Top 100 by cuisine: Barbecue, burger and sandwich joints 1 / 109 Back to Gallery Though Houston is home to some world-class posh eateries, sometimes you just want to chow down on something simple and hearty.
And so does Houston Chronicle food critic Alison Cook.
Juicy burgers, smokey barbecue and gourmet hot dogs all made their way on Cook's esteemed top 100 restaurants of 2015 list.
